meta.title: Mississippi Governor Announces Updates on School Closures - Tunica County School District

meta.content: Mississippi Governor Announces Updates on School Closures

As a result of the announcement made by Mississippi Governor Tate Reeves, all schools including the Tunica County School District will remain closed for the remainder of the semester due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Distance learning will continue through May 21, 2020. We will continue to update you. Thank you for understanding as we work through this unprecedented emergency situation.

h1.span: Mississippi Governor Announces Updates on School Closures

span.p: As a result of the announcement made by Mississippi Governor Tate Reeves, all schools including the Tunica County School District will remain closed for the remainder of the semester due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Distance learning will continue through May 21, 2020. We will continue to update you.
Thank you for understanding as we work through this unprecedented emergency situation.
